title: Documenation search - leverage details from quarkus-bom-quarkus-platform-descriptor

labels.name: area/devtools
labels.description: Issues/PR related to maven, gradle, platform and cli tooling/plugins

body:
### Description

quarkus-bom-quarkus-platform-descriptor artifacts (e.g. https://repo1.maven.org/maven2/io/quarkus/quarkus-bom-quarkus-platform-descriptor/3.1.0.CR1/quarkus-bom-quarkus-platform-descriptor-3.1.0.CR1-3.1.0.CR1.json) contains details about guide related to the extension (`metadata.guide` field).

Currently the search on https://quarkus.io/guides doesn't provide details when the extension name is used. Tried with `quarkus-scheduler` extension name.

Search metadata for guides could be enriched with the details that are captured in the descriptor json file.

This could help with searches based on full extension name and extension name without `quarkus-` prefix.

### Implementation ideas

_No response_
